All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppView
View class for rendering the main application interface.
Camp
Model class representing a camp and manages camp-related operations.
CampCommMember
Model class representing a camp committee member, extending the functionality of the Student class.
CampCommMemberManager
Controller class that manages Camp Committee Member related operations such as getting Camp ID that he is in charge of, suggestions updates and points system updates.
CampCommView
View class for rendering the home menu and managing interactions for Camp Committee Members.
CampEditView
View class for rendering the camp editing interface and managing interactions related to camp modifications.
CampManager
Controller class that manages all operations related to camps, including camp registration and withdrawal for both students and comm members, updating camp details, and generating reports.
CAMsApp
The main class for the Camp Application and Management System (CAMS).
ConsoleColours
Utility Class for colouring coding console outputs
Database
Database class to maintain persistent data integrity.
Enquiry
The Enquiry class represents a user's query within a camp.
EnquiryManager
Controller class that manages operations related to Enquiries, such as adding, deleting, and updating Enquiries.
EnquiryView
View class for rendering the enquiry menu and managing interactions related to camp enquiries.
Staff
Model class representing a staff member, inheriting properties from the User class.
StaffManager
Controller class that manages staff objects.
StaffView
View class for rendering the home menu and managing interactions for Camp Committee Members.
Student
Model class representing a student and manages student-related operations.
StudentManager
Controller class that manages student objects.
StudentView
View class for rendering and managing interactions related to student-specific functionalities.
Suggestion
Model class representing a suggestion and manages suggestions-related operations.
SuggestionManager
Controller class that manages operations related to suggestions, including adding, updating, and removing suggestions.
SuggestionType
Enum representing the types of suggestions that can be made for a camp (Camp Attributes).
SuggestionView
View class for handling suggestions made by Camp Committee Members and Staff.
User
Abstract model class representing a user and manages user-related operations.
UserGroup
UserGroup Enum representing different user groups within NTU.
UserIO
Utility class for user input/output operations.
UserManager
Controller class that manages user-related operations such as registration, password updates, and user validation.
